name: Aim Expert
description:
Aim Expert features a variety of challenges that players can use to test their skills while having fun. They range from simple target practice to more complex scenarios that require players to use their aiming skills to complete the tasks as fast as possible with little to no mistakes in order to achieve the highest scores and ratings.



Aim expert also features a training system that includes a variety of scenarios and difficulties designed to improve your aiming skills.
Choose your own playstyle. Train in individual scenarios or use premade “Playlists” to save time and effort. There are Playlists for any needs ranging from one skill focused to complete practice and training.



Whether you're looking to have fun, trying to get a high score or take your aim to the next level, Aim Expert has something for everyone. So why not give it a try and see how good your aim really is?
